title: The Borgias S2 Bluray Rip 1080p HEVC 10 Bit AC3
description:
My Blu-Ray rips are always taken DIRECTLY from the actual blu-rays, not re-encodings of an earlier h264 torrent, and not "filled in" with web downloads. 

HEVC is a superb machine, but it should be given quality raw materials.

----------------

This is the complete second season of Neil Jordan's Borgias show, taken directly from my blu-ray. The 3rd season will be uploaded later in 2016.

This is an h265 (HEVC) 10 bit LE 2 pass high quality 1080p rip of all ten episodes.

I used x265, "slow" preset, to create a 10 bit VBR in 2 passes, at an average of 1400kbps and peak of 3300kbps.

The audio is 5.1 AC3 at 384kbps. 

Finally, the English subtitles are included (soft coded). The SRT file is also included.

Enjoy, and please, please, continue to seed after you have download
